channel.title: Entertainment
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from Entertainment, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Oprah’s Favorite Slippers Feel Like ‘Cozy Gloves’ for Your Feet — Gift a Pair and Keep a Pair While They’re $50

item.title: Eddie Murphy Believes He was Blacklisted by the Academy After Talking about Racism at the 1988 Oscars

item.title: Justin Baldoni Files Motion Asking Judge to Throw Out Blake Lively's Case Against Him amid Ongoing Legal Battle
